text:
East River, Bronx, at the foot of East Tremont Avenue, viewing southeastward toward Long Island.

P.L.Sperr

(2) East along the Throggs Neck shore, from the foot of E. Tremont Avenue.

P.L.Sperr
August 15, 1940
title: East River - Bronx - Tremont Avenue (East) - Throggs Neck.
